meka.classifiers.multitarget

Class CCp

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.MultilabelClassifier
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CC
            • meka.classifiers.multitarget.CCp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, MultiTargetClassifier, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class CCp
extends CC
implements MultiTargetClassifier
    CCp.java - Multitarget CC with probabilistic output.
    This version includes probabilistic output in the distributionForInstance, like other MT methods.
    i.e.: y[j+L] := P(y[j]|x) (this is usefull when used in an ensemble).
    Version:
    March 2012
    Author:
    Jesse Read (jesse@tsc.uc3m.es)
    See Also:
    CC, Serialized Form
